This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 12 or more brite orange objects(i hav video)from east to west
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the bathroom , which was unlit, and saw a slow moving brite orange object to the north! So i quickly ran to my 2nd floor deck to find 5 or 6 more comming up through the tree line from the east. Thought i was seeing a plane at first , but lite was different than anyplane i've ever seen, I live near two airports and know my planes.I thought rite away ufo. I've lived here for 44 yrs and never seen anything like it! At first i was a little scared but became worried when i had seen how many there was!I saw the objects for approx 10 min! then they flew out of sight.
